**兽人短剑**（orcish short sword）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它是单手武器，由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，使用[短剑](/wiki/%E7%9F%AD%E5%89%91 "短剑")技能，且未鉴定时外观为**粗糙短剑**（crude short sword）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 Variants](#Variants)

  - [4.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [4.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [4.3 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [4.4 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [4.5 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [5 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人（起始种族） (page does not exist)")种族的玩家在游戏开始时即鉴定兽人短剑[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。兽人族的[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时有1⁄2的概率持有一把+0兽人短剑，兽人族的[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一把兽人短剑[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

兽人短剑在随机生成武器中占0.3%。

[强兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%BA%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "强兽人 (page does not exist)")有1⁄3的概率在生成时[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一把兽人短剑，[兽人队长](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E9%98%9F%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人队长 (page does not exist)")有1⁄6的概率在生成时携带一把兽人短剑[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。所有的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")有低于1%的概率在生成时携带兽人短剑[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

## 策略

兽人短剑对小型怪物的伤害是所有短剑中最低的。

## 历史

兽人短剑最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Orcish_short_sword/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") an orcish short sword will produce a short sword.

[Kobolds](/wiki/Kobold_\(monster_class\) "Kobold (monster class)") have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with an orcish short sword.[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)

[Doomblade](/wiki/Doomblade "Doomblade") is a chaotic [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") whose [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is an orcish short sword - it deals +10 damage versus all monsters, with a 1⁄4 chance of dealing an extra (1d4)\*5 damage every attack.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), an orcish short sword deals 1d5 damage to small monsters and 1d10 to large monsters, with a -1 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") penalty.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), an orcish short sword can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining an [orcish dagger](/wiki/Orcish_dagger "Orcish dagger") and 2 [crossbow bolts](/wiki/Crossbow_bolt "Crossbow bolt"). Orcish short swords can be used to create a few items:

- An orcish short sword can be combined with a [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife") to create an [orcish scimitar](/wiki/Orcish_scimitar "Orcish scimitar").
- Two orcish short swords can be combined to create an [orcish long sword](/wiki/Orcish_long_sword "Orcish long sword").
- An orcish short sword can be combined with [gauntlets](/wiki/Gauntlets_\(EvilHack\) "Gauntlets (EvilHack)") to create [orcish boots](/wiki/Orcish_boots "Orcish boots").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, the [Lunatic](/wiki/Lunatic "Lunatic") starts each game with a +0 orcish short sword, and Doomblade is their guaranteed first [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift"). [Slow Blade](/index.php?title=Slow_Blade\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Slow Blade (page does not exist)") is an artifact short sword that has +2 to-hit and +9 damage versus all monsters, and is designed to be the 'opposite' of [Quick Blade](/wiki/Quick_Blade "Quick Blade").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), upgrading an orcish short sword will produce a short sword as in SLASH'EM, and upgrading a [dwarvish short sword](/wiki/Dwarvish_short_sword "Dwarvish short sword") will produce an orcish short sword. Hack'EM also retains Doomblade from SLASH'EM, and forging recipes are the same as in EvilHack.

兽人短剑在随机生成武器中占0.3%。

强兽人有1⁄3的概率在生成时携带一把兽人短剑，兽人队长有1⁄6的概率在生成时携带一把兽人短剑[5][6]。所有的玩家怪物有低于1%的概率在生成时携带兽人短剑[7]。
